columns.Captain_ID: The unique identifier for each captain.
columns.Name: The full name of the captain.
columns.Ship_ID: The identifier for the ship associated with the captain.
columns.age: The age of the captain in years.
columns.Class: The class designation of the ship commanded by the captain.
columns.Rank: The rank held by the captain in the naval hierarchy.

captain.table_description: The table records information about captains and their ships.

columns.Ship_ID: The unique identifier for each ship.
columns.Name: The full name of the ship.
columns.Type: The type designation of the ship.
columns.Built_Year: The year the ship was constructed.
columns.Class: The class designation of the ship.
columns.Flag: The country flag under which the ship operates.

Ship.table_description: The table stores details about ships and their characteristics.
